item.description:
What?
A casual gathering at Gartners IT Expo, Cannes.

Why?
Introducing the applicability of Linked Data to the Enterprise. Impact areas include:

1. Data Virtualization
2. Master Data Management
3. Data Integration
4. Data Reconciliation
5. Schema-last Data Creation & Management.

The idea is to enable information exchange between visitors of IT Expo via casual discussions, lightening talks, presentations, and demonstrations.

Possiblities:
- Presentation on "What does Linked Data mean?" (by Daniel Koller)
- Discussion of use cases and experiences (all)

(I'll try to arrange a presentation/meeting facility at IT Expo: this has to be checked onsite -as I am the first time there.

The arrangement is based on the local situation and the feedback I get here on meetup:

whether we have space to meet and where will communicated during Monday)
item.name: Linked Data Meetup @ Gartner IT Expo
